ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype

Class BackboneShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.layout.prototype.BackboneShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrientableShape, GViewEventListener, GViewEventSubject, java.awt.Shape, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeShape, PinnableShape, StretchableShape, StrokedBackboneShape

    public abstract class BackboneShape
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrientableShape, GViewEventSubject, GViewEventListener
    Describes a shape that is layed out along the Backbone and which can stretch/shrink on zoom levels.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau
